channel.title: Question
channel.description: how i ipban on a 508 server

item.title: Question
item.dc:creator: @J_a_y J a y
item.description:
@J_a_y wrote:

if (cmd[0].equals("ipban")) { String victim = playerCommand.substring((playerCommand.indexOf(" ") + 1)); Player p2 = Server.engine.players[Engine.getIdFromName(victim)]; String host = Server.socketListener.getAddress(p2.socket.socket); if (p2 != null) { p2.getActionSender().logout(p2); p.getActionSender().sendMessage(p, "The player " + p2.username + " has been ipbanned."); p.getActionSender().sendMessage(p, "No more connections may come from " +host); p2.ipBanned(host); BufferedWriter bw = null; p.updateReq = true; p.appearanceUpdateReq = true; SocketListener.loadBannedHosts(); } }
